original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā
